Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_4_Не повезло им. \\!Опус:
Bad luck for them.\!
The Devastators smashed their barricades to smithereens.
dialogs_chapter_4_И на этот раз\\..\\..\: And this time\..\..\.. The enemies are larger.
dialogs_chapter_4_Советую подготовиться: I advise you to prepare for a meeting with them.
dialogs_chapter_4_Верстак целый, а обмен:
The workbench is intact, but the energy exchanger\..\..\..
needs to be repaired.
dialogs_chapter_4_Напоследок, можешь заг:
Lastly, you can come and visit me,
or contact your headquarters.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я должен позвонить отц:
I should call my dad when I'm in the South Canyon
at the Rivalser Intelligence Corps base.
dialogs_chapter_4_Отец?\\. Пап, ты меня: Father?\. Dad, can you hear me?
dialogs_chapter_4_РИОМ?!\\. Слава Богу,:
RIOM?!\.
Thank God you are alive\..\..\..
How is your situation? Badly injured?
Everything is fine with me.\.
I'm as safe as can be.
dialogs_chapter_4_А вот обстановка.\\..\:
But the situation.\..\.. is not very good.
There are a lot of devastators around.
There are reaper bodies everywhere, and I don't 
know exactly where to go.
dialogs_chapter_4_О нет\\..\\..\\.. Ты н:
Oh no\..\..\..
You are in the North Region of Jagged Canyon. \.According
to intelligence, this is a dangerous place. The only 
thing worse is the Southern region or the Dark Forest.
dialogs_chapter_4_Так, сын, слушай внима:
So, son, listen carefully!
The Risen army is hundreds of kilometers away from 
you. This is both bad and good.
dialogs_chapter_4_С одной стороны, ты ри:
On the one hand, you risk failing
the task assigned to your squad\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_С другой, у тебя есть:
On the other hand, you have the opportunity to gather
the scattered forces of the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_4_В смысле, собрать силы:
What do you mean, gather forces?!\. Do you want 
me to lead an army of a couple hundred reapers?
dialogs_chapter_4_Нет! Нет\\..\\..\\.. Я:
No no\..\..\..
That's not what I meant.
dialogs_chapter_4_Помоги им с чем нужно:
Help them with whatever they need and explain 
the situation if they themselves don’t know what’s 
going on.
dialogs_chapter_4_Походу дела, продвигай:
As things go, move towards the South Canyon to the base
of my warriors - the Rivalser Intelligence Corps. This place is 
the rallying point for the remaining troops of Purgatory.
When you arrive, you will be able to strike at the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_4_Спасибо, отец! Как буд:
Thank you, father!
I'll let you know when I'm there.
dialogs_chapter_4_Конечно, Риом. Жду тво: Of course, Riom. I'm waiting for your next call.
dialogs_chapter_4_Не стоит отвлекать вер: Do not distract the Werolomgers person without reason.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вероломгер Ирей, это Р: Werolomger Irey, this is Riom Ruri!
dialogs_chapter_4_Звони мне только если:
Only call me if you see anything unusual,
that I have never seen before.
dialogs_chapter_4_О!\\. Давно тебя не бы:
Oh!\. I haven’t heard from you for a long time. I know, the 
campaign failed\..\..\.. I'm sorry about your squad\..\..\.. 
Almost the entire battalion destroyed\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Ага.\\. Дюжина раненых:
Yeah.\. A dozen wounded and fifty survivors.
I don't know where they went. But if you meet
them, help them get to the nearest outpost.
dialogs_chapter_4_Не позволь им разбить:
Don't let them set up camp somewhere under the 
rocks in Jagged Canyon. 
They'll quickly run to the smell of blood devastators.
dialogs_chapter_4_Буду признателен, если: I would appreciate it if you do as I say.
dialogs_chapter_4_Сидрин рассказал о баз:
Sidrin told about the intelligence base in the Southern 
region?
dialogs_chapter_4_Да, отец говорил, что:
Yes, father said that in the South there is a meeting 
point for all the reapers. 
From there I can strike at the Risen\..\..\.. And kill them.
dialogs_chapter_4_Нет, я без понятия, чт: No, I have no idea what kind of base this is.
dialogs_chapter_4_Точка сбора жнецов в Ю:
Reapers' rally point in the southern region of Jagged 
Canyon. Sidrin's scouts are there now.
dialogs_chapter_4_Хорошо. Если не уверен:
Okay. If you're not sure what you should do -
consult Sidrin.\.
And I will help with problems of a magical nature.
dialogs_chapter_4_Если увидишь что-то кр:
If you see something extremely unusual that you 
have never seen before once\..\..\.. or phenomena 
that you yourself cannot understand.\.
Don't hesitate - let me know right away.
dialogs_chapter_4_Благодарю за заботу, И: Thank you for your concern, Irey!
dialogs_chapter_4_Сейчас нет причин звон: There's no reason to call the commander now.
dialogs_chapter_4_Командир Рикард, это Р: Commander Ricard, this is Riom Ruri!
dialogs_chapter_4_О! Ты ещё жив?\\. Непл:
Oh! Are you still alive?\.
Not a bad start.
dialogs_chapter_4_Помощь! Я застрял в Се:
Help! I'm stuck in the North Canyon\..\..\.. my
the detachment was defeated\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Я дал тебе одно из сам:
I gave you one of the deadliest weapons - the Genome
Morkret. You were far from weak fighters.\.
I don't care about the rest.
dialogs_chapter_4_К твоему счастью, наст: Luckily for you, I'm in a good mood\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Опустошители наконец-т:
The devastators have finally done their greatest 
stupidity - united with the Risen, which means\..\..\..
We can legally exterminate them.
dialogs_chapter_4_Эти твари давно напраш: These creatures have been asking for a long time.
dialogs_chapter_4_(Как тебя самого за та: (How were you not executed for such thoughts?)
dialogs_chapter_4_Командир, из-за этого:
Commander, because of this alliance we are suffering 
such losses, which did not exist in the First Adamant War.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я постараюсь найти ино:
I will try to find another way to solve the problem with
devastators. But I can't handle the Risen alone.
dialogs_chapter_4_Дерзай!\\. Весь карате:
Go for it!\. The entire punitive corps moves towards
the Southern region of Jagged Canyon. Move there, 
and you might even cross paths with someone.
dialogs_chapter_4_Если рядом с тобой буд: If there are punitive forces near you, I will inform you.
Until we get in touch and\..\..\.. try not to die.
This is bad\..\..\.. We need to get a lot of histite,
a couple of pyrite fragments and of course\..\..\..
Hydrite. I hope there is at least one left in my pocket.
dialogs_chapter_4_Отлично! Пара лишних с:
Great! A couple of extra bars wouldn't hurt me.
I hope there is enough clean energy for them\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Пока что ресурсов мало: There won't be enough resources for now...
dialogs_chapter_4_Для починки необходимо:
To repair, you need 10 histite fragments,
2 pyrite shards and 1 hydrite shard.
dialogs_chapter_4_Получены рецепты: Скор:
Recipes received: Speed module, Power module,
Security Module, Intelligent Module, Life Module,
Energy module.
dialogs_chapter_4_Модули предназначены д:
Modules are designed to improve armor.
They connect to equipment and enhance it, adding
on the same principle as alloys.
dialogs_chapter_4_ Риом с но:
Riom is wounded from head to toe and on the verge
 of losing consciousness.
dialogs_chapter_4_На сегодня с тебя дост:
You've had enough for today.\.
Don't worry, I protected your body with a shadow dome,
the devastators will pass by and not even notice.
dialogs_chapter_4_Коельтан, видишь где-т: Koeltan, do you see a descent or passage somewhere?
There is one option.\.
I feel the weak, brittle rock right underneath us.
dialogs_chapter_4_Тут пара сотен метров:
It's a couple of hundred meters high\..\..\..
How do you propose to get down?
dialogs_chapter_4_Пока не знаю, сам поду: I don’t know yet, think for yourself.
dialogs_chapter_4_Может у кого из мертвы:
Maybe one of the dead reapers has a map, drawings\..\..\..
Look for something like that, and then we’ll see.
dialogs_chapter_4_И ещё, на случай, если:
And also, in case the path is blocked by
something huge, like a rubble\..\..\.. or
a giant thug - my special strike will help you.
dialogs_chapter_4_Постой\\..\\..\\.. это:
Wait\..\..\..is that like a shadow strike?\.
You gather energy and hit at the right angle.\.
Like this?
dialogs_chapter_4_Направление мыслей вер:
The direction of thought is correct\..\..\.. but no.\.
A cut is very different from a simple blow.\.
Come to me in the illusory world, and I will
I'll explain it to you.
dialogs_chapter_4_Как будешь отдыхать в:
When you rest in a safe corner,
come visit me. You'll find out everything there.
dialogs_chapter_4_Чёрт\\..\\..\\.. Что ж:
Damn\..\..\.. Why so unlucky\..\..\..
First they threw me off a cliff, then I
had to repair the teleport\..\..\..
And now I’ve reached a dead end.
dialogs_chapter_4_Путь воина никогда не:
The path of a warrior has never been easy.\.
Learn to look for the positive in everything.
dialogs_chapter_4_Смотри, ты один из сот:
Look, you are one of the hundreds who survived my
trial. Already a good start.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ты смог спасти красави:
You were able to save the beautiful blonde from
punitive blades, also proved her
innocence.
dialogs_chapter_4_Это охренеть какое дос:
This is one hell of an achievement!\.
Even the punishers themselves admitted this.
dialogs_chapter_4_Теперь на твоих плечах:
Now you have a responsible task on your shoulders -
kill the bastards who are always drawn to
Purgatory.\.
This is usually what the High Reapers are tasked with.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ясное дело – будет тру:
It’s clear that it will be difficult, painful, scary.\.
But I’m with you and will help you with everything you 
need.
dialogs_chapter_4_Только постарайся не л:
Just try not to get into trouble.
I don’t want to look for a worthy reaper
for another couple of hundred years.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вот и отлично. А тепер:
That is great. Now get up, it's time to move towards 
your goal.
dialogs_chapter_4_Зато живой!\\! Как зак:
But alive!\!
When you finish whining, I’ll wait for you in the illusory 
world.
Phew! We barely made it!\
Just a little more and they would have spotted us.
dialogs_chapter_4_К нам движутся опустош:
Devastators are moving towards us\..\..\..
humanoid body shape\..\..\.. and with weapons.
dialogs_chapter_4_Нам повезло, что дикие:
We are lucky that the wild are essentially uncontrollable
predators.
dialogs_chapter_4_Они нападают и на жнец:
They attack both the reapers and their own\..\..\.. those 
who have humanoid body.
dialogs_chapter_4_Поэтому к нам идёт лиш: Therefore, only 10% of the huge flock comes to us.
dialogs_chapter_4_Готовьте взрывные слит:
Prepare explosive ingots, we won't let them reach
before us.
dialogs_chapter_4_Брикс, создавай слитки:
Brix, create ingots. Give them to everyone who
needs them!
dialogs_chapter_4_Риом, ты возьми сторон: Riom, you take the side behind you!
dialogs_chapter_4_А я буду оборонять пра: And I will defend the right flank.
They seem to have calmed down.\.
But don't let your guard down.
dialogs_chapter_4_Где же тот спуск, о ко: Where is the descent you talked about at the base?
dialogs_chapter_4_Он здесь, рядом со мно: It is here, next to me!
dialogs_chapter_4_Но сначала всё равно п: But first you still have to jump.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вижу тебя. \\!Мы с реб:
I see you. \!The guys and I have built something 
here and we’ll help deal with these three.
dialogs_chapter_4_Спасибо\\..\\..\\.. Бу: Thank you\..\..\.. I would be very grateful for your help.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ильнара, дикие опустош:
Ilnara, the wild devastators are dead, and I see there's 
a box with Hierarchy here.
dialogs_chapter_4_В ответ Риом получил л: Riom received only silence in response.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ильнара! Брикс! Вы там: Ilnara! Brix! Did you fall asleep there?!
dialogs_chapter_4_Бесполезно. Я не чувст:
It's no use. I don't feel their presence
anywhere.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вот блин! Риом, не под:
Damn it! Riom, don't let him near!! \|
Hit with all that's left!!\^
dialogs_chapter_4_Ты видел нечто подобно: Have you seen something like this?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_В первый раз такое виж: This is the first time I see this\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Тини говорил, что\\..\:
Tini said that\..\..\.. his squad encountered
some huge creature\..\..\.. she is also
knocked out a whole piece of the wall.
dialogs_chapter_4_Если на отряд Ильнары: If Ilnara’s squad was attacked by something like this\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Думаю, искать их больш: I think there is no point in looking for them anymore.
dialogs_chapter_4_А ты\\..\\..\\.. поста: And you\..\..\.. try not to run into this monster.
Reaper, do you hear me?\. Ilnara is in touch. 
Engineering Corps, Supply Detachment.
dialogs_chapter_4_Продолжай двигаться в:
Keep moving towards the gorge. 
We'll meet you there.
And be careful not to drag your tail with you.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вижу тебя! Теперь осмо:
I see you! Now look around the gorge.
\.Touch the wall to the left of the crack.
dialogs_chapter_4_За стеной спрятан пота:
There is a secret passage hidden behind the wall. 
Our secret base is there\..\..\.. Faster Please!
dialogs_chapter_4_Подозрительно птичка щ:
The bird chirps suspiciously. It looks a lot like an 
ambush.\. In my time, bandits robbed caravans like 
this. They sent a girl to distract and lure merchants, 
while they surrounded and attacked.
dialogs_chapter_4_Мы в мире Мёртвых, как:
We are in the world of the Dead, what kind of bandits
 could there be here?!
dialogs_chapter_4_Тем более, среди жнецо:
Especially among the reapers\..\..\..
I've never seen one in my entire life.
dialogs_chapter_4_Дела, как погляжу, у в:
As far as I can see, things are really bad for you\..\..\..
How can I help?
dialogs_chapter_4_Для начала нужно Брикс: First you need to heal Brix.
dialogs_chapter_4_У тебя есть лечебный с: Do you have a healing ingot?
dialogs_chapter_4_Сын одного из сильнейш:
The son of one of the strongest Werolomgers!\.
But what are you doing here?\.
I thought they don't send anyone in this area except 
researchers and scouts\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Вы разве не знаете, чт: Don't you know what happened in the Silver Desert?
dialogs_chapter_4_Моя группа помогает с:
My group helps with exploration of the canyon's 
dungeons.\. We rarely get called.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ну тогда, вам стоит зн:
Well then, you should know that there are Risen in
the desert and the Devastators smashed a battalion
of War Reapers to dust. The punitive squad also
suffered\..\..\.. and I'm kind of the last one standing.
dialogs_chapter_4_П-Подожди! Стоп-стоп-с:
W-Wait! Stop-stop-stop! This is bad\..\..\..
Very very bad!
dialogs_chapter_4_Сначала дикие опустоши:
First the wild devastators burst out\..\..\..
And now our main army has been defeated.
dialogs_chapter_4_Насчет диких.\\. Расск:
About the wild ones.\.
Tell me more about what happened.
dialogs_chapter_4_Эти твари сидели под з:
These creatures sat quietly underground and 
delivered problems are only for those who invade their
territory.
dialogs_chapter_4_Влур-Стиг не просто та:
Vlur-Stig did not just drive away all his unsuccessful
creations underground.\.
There are a lot of useful resources here, undiscovered
secrets and other things.
dialogs_chapter_4_Самое лакомое место дл:
The most delicious place for reapers.\.
Expedition after expedition was constantly sent here.
dialogs_chapter_4_Стычки с дикими происх:
Clashes with wild ones happened often, but it was 
worth giving them resistance - they retreated\..\..\.. 
Until recently.
dialogs_chapter_4_В один миг связь со вс:
In an instant, the connection with all teleports was 
severed, and then wild devastators crawled out of all 
the holes and attacked all bases\..\..\.. Simultaneously!
dialogs_chapter_4_Всё, что находилось по:
Everything that was underground and on the hills -
was actively destroyed by the devastators\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Раз так, тогда вам нуж:
If so, then you need to get out of here.\.
If necessary, I can accompany you to the teleport.
It's\..\..\.. not far from here.
dialogs_chapter_4_Боюсь, мы не можем так: I'm afraid we can't just leave.
dialogs_chapter_4_Не думаю, что задание:
I don’t think the mission is a priority right now.\.
Purgatory recalls all reapers and you should run
from here before these creatures kill you.
dialogs_chapter_4_Мы вернёмся в Чистилищ:
We will return to Purgatory\..\..\..
But first we have to finish the task.
dialogs_chapter_4_ *Ильнара открыла: *Ilnara opened the holographic tablet and handed it to Riom*
dialogs_chapter_4_Доставить из подземной: Deliver a box from underground base number 6...
dialogs_chapter_4_Перед началом всего эт:
Before all this\..\..\.. horror began, a group of
scouts was able to obtain several fragments 
of Hierarchite from the depths of the Forgotten City.
dialogs_chapter_4_Это неисследованное ме:
It's an unexplored place full of technology and
materials belonging to the Hierarch race.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ага\\..\\..\\.. И я та:
Yeah\..\..\.. And I see this box is lost somewhere around 
here?
dialogs_chapter_4_Да. Он\\..\\..\\.. Пря:
Yes. It's\..\..\.. Right in the center of the area that is 
a couple hundreds meters lower. 
We'll have to go down.
dialogs_chapter_4_Правда из-за крылатого:
It’s true that because of the winged devastator we 
really can’t stick our heads out\..\..\.. 
and the little things really bother us.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я уже приноровился, и: I've already got used to it, and I can guide you.
dialogs_chapter_4_Но для начала, что име: But first, what exactly is in this box?
Shards of Hierarchite.\.
The High Reaper Irei ordered to deliver them 
to him.
dialogs_chapter_4_После Первой Войны Ада:
After the First Adamant War, his body suffered 
greatly, and without these fragments he will not be 
able to restore his armor.
dialogs_chapter_4_Точно\\..\\..\\.. Сейч:
Exactly\..\..\.. Now his body is protected by pyrite 
armor, but it's weaker.
dialogs_chapter_4_И как ты собираешься д: And how are you going to get to your cargo?
dialogs_chapter_4_Если бы внизу был рабо: If only there was a working teleport below\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Там есть телепорт, но: There is a teleport there, but it needs repairs.
dialogs_chapter_4_Остаётся только спуск: All that remains is the descent from the top\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Совсем рядом расположе:
There is a huge rock very nearby,
there is a guard station there.
There are two slopes directly below it.\.
Smooth and steep.
dialogs_chapter_4_Нужно, чтобы ты отвлек:
We need you to distract the devastator with
wings, he causes the most problems.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я с отрядом доберусь д:
My squad and I will get to the top by a roundabout 
route, where there are the fewest creatures.
dialogs_chapter_4_Смотрительный пункт бу: The lookout point will be our rally point.
dialogs_chapter_4_Хочешь сделать из меня: Do you want to make me a bait?
dialogs_chapter_4_Только для крылатого.\:
Only for the winged one.\.
You don’t have to touch the rest!
dialogs_chapter_4_Отлично. Мы с ребятами:
Great. The guys and I will get ready, and you tell me
when you're ready.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вот сборочный механизм:
Here is the assembly mechanism. Make one and 
give it to Brix.
dialogs_chapter_4_А вот и ты. Готов начи: And here you are. Ready to get started?
dialogs_chapter_4_: You can hear joy in your voice and look.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ладно.\\. А с чего так: OK.\. Why is he so cheerful?
dialogs_chapter_4_Ты один из немногих, к:
You are one of the few who were able to live up to 
this moment. Second in a row.
Unfortunately\..\..\..
No one got further than the cut.
dialogs_chapter_4_Предыдущий жнец быстро:
The previous reaper quickly mastered this technique,
and after - his self-confidence took over. He felt 
invincible\..\..\.. shredded enemies with such taste\..\..\.. with such
appetite\..\..\.. that at one moment he killed his own squad.
dialogs_chapter_4_Почему? Жажда крови от: Why? Has bloodlust overwhelmed his brain?
dialogs_chapter_4_В яблочко!\\. Самоконт:
Exactly!\.
Self-control was the main weakness of the past 
reaper.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я возлагаю на тебя бол:
I have high hopes for you, Riom. \.Do not disappoint 
me.
dialogs_chapter_4_Постараюсь. А теперь\\: Will try. And now\..\..\.. Can we start already?
dialogs_chapter_4_У любого оружия с душо:
Any weapon with a soul has its own element\..\..\..
its favorite food\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Насытившись ею, он раз:
Having become saturated with it, 
he defeats his enemies with enhanced power.
dialogs_chapter_4_: Koeltan pointed his sword towards Riom.
Do you feel\..\..\.. my desire to kill you?
dialogs_chapter_4_Риом ощутил сильную рв:
Riom felt violently vomiting, weak and afraid.
            His heart began to beat wildly. His legs could barely support his body.
dialogs_chapter_4_Это любимое блюдо Гено: This is Genom Morkret's favorite dish!
dialogs_chapter_4_Жажда крови.\\. Желани:
Bloodlust.\.
The desire to take the target's life.\.
The stronger they are\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Тем сильнее будут твои: The stronger your attacks will be!
dialogs_chapter_4_И как я должен освоить:
And how should I master this technique?
Are you going to fight again?
No.\. Not this time.\.
Remember this feeling, this is how your enemies 
should feel when they see Genom Morkret.
dialogs_chapter_4_Сейчас ты ненадолго по:
Now you will be in my shoes for a while and you will 
understand what I'm talking about.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ах\\..\\..\\.. полная:
Ah\..\..\.. complete synergy\..\..\..
Watch and remember, Riom Ruri.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ты успел прямо к обеду: You made it just in time for lunch.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я тут с опустошителями:
Here I am at war with the devastators, and you are 
drinking tea\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Часть силы Генома Морк:
You have received part of the power of the Morkret 
Genome.
dialogs_chapter_4_Коельтан делает глоток: Koeltan takes a sip of tea.
dialogs_chapter_4_Что еще ты от меня хоч: What else do you want from me?
dialogs_chapter_4_При нашей встрече\\..\:
When we met\..\..\.. in the canyon. You moved
at such a speed\..\..\.. I couldn’t even keep up
with you!
dialogs_chapter_4_Ещё в округе есть нема:
There are also quite a few places in the area where 
I would like get in, but I can’t\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Словно ты замедляешь в: It's like you're slowing down time\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_4_Риом. \\!Что ты от мен: Riom. \!What do you want from me?
dialogs_chapter_4_Научи меня двигаться с: Teach me to move at the same speed as you!
dialogs_chapter_4_На будущее. Обычно я з:
For the future. I usually take away part of the spiritual
energy from the reaper, in return teaching new 
techniques.
dialogs_chapter_4_Но теневой шаг тебе не: But you need a shadow step.
dialogs_chapter_4_Этому приему я обучу т: I will teach you this technique for free.
dialogs_chapter_4_Навернешься с большой: If you fall from a great height, it’s your own fault.
dialogs_chapter_4_Ты уже овладел этим пр: You have already mastered this technique.
dialogs_chapter_4_Что ж, Риом... Добро п: Well, Riom... Welcome to the illusory world.
dialogs_chapter_4_Я воссоздал условия, г:
I have recreated the conditions where you will most 
often use shadow step.
dialogs_chapter_4_Техника теневого шага:
The shadow step technique will work and you
You will be transported to the very top of the peak.
dialogs_chapter_4_Попробуй подвигаться \:
Try to move\! back and forth. \! Better yet, around 
the edges.
dialogs_chapter_4_Куда смотришь, туда и: Wherever you look, you teleport there.
dialogs_chapter_4_Попрактикуйся, а когда: Practice, and when you get tired...
dialogs_chapter_4_Допрыгай до этой точки: Jump to this point and I will take you back.
dialogs_chapter_4_Для прыжка подойдите к:
To jump, go to the edge of the top and press \C[3]Z,\C[0]
or \C[3]Space\C[0].
dialogs_chapter_4_Теперь Риом может своб: Riom can now move freely on higher ground.
And now - on the way out.
dialogs_chapter_4_Вот сборочный механизм:
Here is the assembly mechanism.\.
You can make a healing ingot with it.
dialogs_chapter_4_Подожди\\..\\..\\.. по:
Wait\..\..\.. remember what I asked
do you?
dialogs_chapter_4_(Ты хотел мне что-то в:
(Did you want to show me something in your world?
Yes I remember.)
dialogs_chapter_4_Советую сделать это се:
I advise you to do it now.
It is unknown what you will encounter there\..\..\..
at the bottom.
Wait a minute\..\..\.. before you start, it's worth
there's something else to do.
dialogs_chapter_4_Неизвестно с насколько:
It is unknown how big an obstacle you are
you will collide.
Organic\..\..\.. or any other.
dialogs_chapter_4_У тебя должен быть “ко:
You must have an "ace in your pocket." \.
In this case, this is my special blow - shadow
incision.
dialogs_chapter_4_Немного манны и препят:
A little manna and the obstacle is demolished in one
swing!
dialogs_chapter_4_*Риом приложил левую р: *Riom puts his left hand to the wall*
dialogs_chapter_4_Это хоть что-то. Иерар:
This is at least something.
Hierarchite is a very rare and valuable resource.
It can be exchanged for a decent amount, or
saved for creating very powerful armor.
dialogs_chapter_4_Когда враг находится в:
When the enemy is in the \I[75] state, they will not 
receive any damage and will not be able to attack 
you. Beat the one who is not in this state.
